snippet: Saudi security forces arrested a Syrian man accused of plotting attacks and his Filipino accomplice in a raid on an illegal explosives factory in Riyadh, the Interior Ministry said.
lead_paragraph: Saudi security forces arrested a Syrian man accused of plotting attacks and his Filipino accomplice in a raid on an illegal explosives factory in Riyadh, the Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia Arrests 2 People Accused of Plotting Attacks
headline.print_headline: Saudi Arabia Arrests 2 People Accused of Plotting Attacks
